mapper.select: SELECT SUM(nmrecg_cnt) nmrecg_cnt , SUM(nmrecg_size) nmrecg_size , SUM(learn_cnt) learn_cnt , SUM(learn_size) learn_size , SUM(learn_rslt_cnt) learn_rslt_cnt , AVG(learn_rslt_rate) learn_rslt_rate , MAX(algo_ver) learn_rslt_rate , MAX(algo_rflt_date) algo_rflt_date FROM t_ails_dashboard WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(WORK_DATE, '%Y%m%d') >= '20010101' AND DATE_FORMAT(WORK_DATE, '%Y%m%d') <= '20221001'
